activityData.scenario: An Xbox 360 connected to a Router with a Wireless connection using the Wireless Adapter. The customer calls because they cannot connect to Xbox LIVE.
activityData.completion: The customer can now connect to Xbox LIVE.

feedback.incorrect: Generic first incorrect feedback.
Generic second incorrect feedback.
Generic third incorrect feedback.

step.description: Select the Wireless Adapter attached to the Xbox console to determine connectivity.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. The wireless adapter is located behind the Xbox 360 console and has two antennae. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the wireless adapter to proceed to the next step.

step.description: The Wireless Adapter N is being used.
The adapter is connected to the wireless Network.
Run Connection Test by selecting the Xbox wireless controller.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Run Connection Test by selecting the Xbox wireless controller. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the Xbox wireless controller to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Press the Guide button on your controller.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. The guide button is the large button located between the “back” and “start” button. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the Guide button to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Settings.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Settings. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Settings to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select System Settings.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select System Settings. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select System Settings to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Network Settings.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Network Settings. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Network Settings to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select the Wireless network connection.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Wireless Network. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Wireless Network to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select the Xbox Wireless network connection.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Xbox Wireless Network. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Xbox Wireless Network to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Test Xbox LIVE Connection.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Test Xbox LIVE Connection. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Test Xbox LIVE Connection to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select More Info.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select More Info. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select More Info to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select the Back button to access the Network Settings to manually configure DNS settings.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Back button. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select thte Back button to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Configure Network.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Configure Network. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Configure Network to proceed to the next step.

step.description: On the Basic Settings tab, select DNS Settings.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select DNS Settings. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select DNS Settings to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Manual.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Manual. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Manual to proceed to the next step.

step.description: The customer indicated that he has PC and can successfully access Xbox.com through the internet browser. Select the PC to acquire DNS Settings and enter in manual configuration

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select the PC to acquire DNS Settings. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the PC to proceed to the next step.

step.description: On your computer, click Start.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Start. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Start to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Type 'cmd' and then press ENTER.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Type 'cmd', and then press ENTER. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Type 'cmd', and then press ENTER to proceed to the next step.

step.description: At the command prompt, type 'ipconfig /all' and then press ENTER.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Type 'ipconfig /all', and then press ENTER. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Type 'ipconfig /all', and then press ENTER to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Locate the Primary DNS Server number and record it on the posted note, then press ENTER.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Record the Primary DNS Server number, and then press ENTER. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Record the Secondary DNS Server number (192.168.0.95) on the posted note, and then press ENTER to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Locate the Secondary DNS Server number and record it on the posted note, then press ENTER.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Record the Secondary DNS Server number, and then press "ENTER". Try again.
That is still incorrect. Record the Secondary DNS Server number (192.168.0.75) on the posted note, and then press ENTER to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Click on the Close (X) button when complete.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Close the window by selecting the (X) button at the top right hand corner of the window. Try Again.
That is still incorrect. Click the Close (X) button to proceed.

step.description: Select the Xbox Wireless Controller to enter the DNS numbers

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Manually configure the DNS settings by selecting the Xbox wireless controller. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the Xbox wireless controller to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Primary DNS Server.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Primary DNS Server from the DNS Settings tab. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Primary DNS Server to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Enter the Primary DNS Server number and then select Done.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Enter the Primary DNS Server number and select Done. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Enter the correct Primary DNS Server number and then select Done to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Secondary DNS Server.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Secondary DNS Server from the DNS Settings tab. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Secondary DNS Server to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Enter the Secondary DNS Server number and then select Done.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Enter the Secondary DNS Server number and then select Done. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Enter the correct Secondary DNS Server number and then select Done to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Done.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Done. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Done to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select the Back button to access Network Settings.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select the Back button to go back to Network Settings. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the Back button to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Test LIVE Xbox Connection.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Test LIVE Xbox Connection. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Test Xbox Connection to proceed to the next step.
